goals.title: Avoid Backbiting
goals.description: Commit to not speaking about others in their absence in ways they would dislike
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Do you know what backbiting is? It is to mention your brother in a manner which he does not like.'
daily_actions: Before speaking about someone, ask: Would they be comfortable hearing this?
Redirect conversations away from gossip
Practice speaking positively about others

goals.title: Speak Only Truth
goals.description: Commit to complete honesty in all speech, avoiding lies both big and small
goals.islamic_guidance: Allah says: 'So shun the filth of idols and shun lying speech.' (22:30)
daily_actions: Pause before speaking to ensure truthfulness
Avoid exaggerations and embellishments
Admit mistakes honestly when they occur

goals.title: Avoid Unnecessary Arguments
goals.description: Practice restraint in debates and conflicts, choosing peace over being right
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'I guarantee a house in Paradise for one who gives up arguing, even if he is right.'
daily_actions: Count to 10 before responding in disagreements
Ask: Is this argument necessary?
Practice saying 'You may be right' and moving on

goals.title: Lower the Gaze
goals.description: Practice modesty by lowering the gaze from inappropriate sights
goals.islamic_guidance: Allah says: 'Tell the believing men to reduce some of their vision and guard their private parts.' (24:30)
daily_actions: Practice the 3-second rule: look away after 3 seconds
Focus on people's faces during conversations
Avoid lingering looks at inappropriate content

goals.title: Mindful Media Consumption
goals.description: Be selective about visual content, avoiding harmful or inappropriate material
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'The glance is a poisoned arrow from the arrows of Iblis.'
daily_actions: Set specific times for media consumption
Use content filters and parental controls
Choose educational or spiritually beneficial content

goals.title: Practice Daily Humility
goals.description: Actively work to reduce arrogance and develop genuine humility
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'No one will enter Paradise who has an atom's weight of pride in his heart.'
daily_actions: Acknowledge others' contributions publicly
Ask for advice even in areas of expertise
Practice serving others without recognition

goals.title: Accept Constructive Criticism
goals.description: Learn to receive feedback gracefully without defensiveness
goals.islamic_guidance: Omar (RA) said: 'May Allah have mercy on the person who shows me my faults.'
daily_actions: Thank people for feedback before responding
Ask clarifying questions instead of defending
Implement one piece of feedback each day

goals.title: Mindful Eating Practice
goals.description: Eat only what is necessary, avoiding excess and waste
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'No human ever filled a vessel worse than the stomach.'
daily_actions: Stop eating when 80% full
Eat slowly and mindfully
Begin meals with Bismillah and end with gratitude

goals.title: Eliminate Food Waste
goals.description: Take only what you can finish and use all food purchased
goals.islamic_guidance: Allah says: 'And eat and drink but be not excessive. Indeed, He likes not those who commit excess.' (7:31)
daily_actions: Plan meals in advance
Use leftovers creatively
Share excess food with those in need

goals.title: Overcome Envy
goals.description: Actively work to remove jealousy and envy from the heart
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Do not envy one another, do not hate one another, and be servants of Allah as brothers.'
daily_actions: Make dua for those you feel envious of
Practice gratitude for your own blessings
Celebrate others' successes genuinely

goals.title: Daily Gratitude Practice
goals.description: Actively count and appreciate Allah's blessings each day
goals.islamic_guidance: Allah says: 'If you are grateful, I will certainly give you more.' (14:7)
daily_actions: List 3 things you're grateful for each morning
Thank someone daily for their kindness
Reflect on blessings during difficult moments

goals.title: Purify Daily Intentions
goals.description: Check and correct intentions regularly to seek only Allah's pleasure
goals.islamic_guidance: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Actions are but by intention, and every person will have only what they intended.'
daily_actions: Begin each task by checking your intention
Renew intention for worship throughout the day
Reflect on motivations before major decisions
